Name: BRAVO DLX Inclined Kitchen Chimney
Short description: The Kutchina Bravo DLX inclined kitchen chimney helps you get rid of toxic fumes and smoke from your kitchen. Loaded with a number of features, this chimney enhances your cooking experience by eliminating the harmful cooking fumes. With a suction capacity of 1200±50 m³/h, this filterless chimney efficiently sucks the fumes while making sure that your kitchen is clean and fresh. The 60 cm length is ideal for small to medium-sized kitchens. The touch control panel makes it easy to operate the chimney, which comes with two-speed settings. Equipped with i-Autoclean technology, the chimney doesn’t require manual cleaning. The artificial intelligence-based sensors detect grease and oil and schedule the cleaning, allowing touch-free cleaning. The product comes with a lifetime warranty on the motor.
